column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A young man traveling with a woman drove a car carelessly at a high speed into a central divider. Fortunately
column4: no one was injured.------The incident happened at 1:10 AM on Thursday
column7: along the corner of Monivong Street and Street 360 in Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang I
column9: Phnom Penh.------According to sources at the scene
column11: a young man was seen driving a black Starex car with license plate Phnom Penh 2AV-0052 with a woman passenger along Monivong Street heading south at high speed
column12: when he arrived at the scene
column14: causing the car to be severely damaged.------After the incident
column16: leaving only the car at the scene and the concrete divider scattered all over the road.------After a while
column17: the local authorities arrived and contacted the city traffic experts to come down to measure and make a record to take the car to be stored at the Office of Road Traffic
column18: waiting for the car owner to come in and solve the issue legally.Â ------NKD
